Title: Corrigendum to “Formation and properties of water from quartz and hydrogen at high pressure and temperature” [Earth Planet. Sci. Lett. 461 (2017) 54–60] (S0012821X16307440) (10.1016/j.epsl.2016.12.031)
Abstract: © 2017 Elsevier B.V.A mistake was made, inadvertently, in normalizing the histograms and, therefore, the curves shown in Fig. 4a are not densities in g/cm3 units as it was written. The curves should be rescaled by a factor of 2.3. The qualitative shape of the profiles and ratio of the elements is correct. The corrected Fig. 4a appears below for the readers' convenience. We wish to thank Dr. E. Kvaalen for drawing our attention to this error.
